metadata.title: CVE-2022-32749 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability handlingrequests in Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to crash the serverunder certain conditions. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from8.0.0 through 9.1.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32749` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

trafficserver - 9.2.0+ds-2
trafficserver-experimental-plugins - 9.2.0+ds-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.2.0+ds-2').
